text: Being John Malkovich is a 1999 American fantasy comedy movie written by Charlie Kaufman and directed by Spike Jonze. The movie stars John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener, and John Malkovich. Malkovich plays a version of himself. Cusack plays a puppeteer who finds a portal that takes him inside Malkovich's mind. The movie was released on October 29, 1999 in the United States by USA Films. == Cast == Source: ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:American fantasy-comedy movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:1999 comedy movies Category:1999 fantasy movies Category:1990s independent movies Category:American independent movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies featuring puppetry
title: Being John Malkovich
